posts.post_title: FS T206 Red Cobb SGC 20 Pied 350 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Card is now Sold.. thanks...

$1700.... great eye appeal for the grade... Price includes shipping and insurance.

posts.post_title: Thank you for leaving price noted in listing, even though SOLD
posts.post_content:
.
.
.
I know it is a mixed camp on whether to do so or not (with majority on not).  There was once a discussion thread a few years ago on this subject.  But I find it helpful (if/when I am thinking of posting a similar item) to know what other Net54 OC members were asking, and perhaps sold their card for.  I would rather take guidance from the knowledgeable actions of this membership and indicate a reasonable price, rather than guess with an unrealistic price.

Thank you again for leaving your stated price even though item has sold.

Agreed with HexsHeroes. 

...and if you have a similar Cobb...I’d be interested in seeing it! 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
